name: Super Mario Maker Unity!
description:
It a me, MARIO and his brother LUIGI in SUPER MARIO MAKER UNITY in a PC fan game by AllOfTheAbove66! I been doing game development for about 4 months and I thought it would be really cool to "TRY" to recreate Super Mario Maker for PC with the little coding knowledge that I have.

How to play: Mario moves with the arrow keys and jumped with spacebar. Luigi moves with A & D keys and jumps with W key. Both Mario and Luigi can both infinitely jump! This game is multiplayer so play with a with a buddy for the best enjoyment!

Secrets: I put a weird Mario in the game, can you find him?!?

Important things you should know: This is my first ever video game I ever published, so keep that in mind. The coin blocks and the Goombas do not work properly and some other minor things. If you find a major game-breaking bugs please notify me and I'll try to fix it!

System requirements: you need (34.0 MB Windows 32 Bit version) or (37.0 MB Windows 64 Bit version) or (47.0 MB 64bit + Apple Silicon version) or (52.0 MB Linux 64bit version) hard drive space is needed.

Menu music remix by 12DAMDO link: (2) DashieXP - Super Mario Maker (12DAMDO [EXTENDED] REMIX) - YouTube

Game Play Testers: Me, My Brother and Elegant Melody Her Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/elegant_melody/ Her YouTube Channel https://youtube.com/channel/UCPTPd1LuQlLX4pKFP-1Td7A

Special thanks: Zyger, MK's Guide, Bones Official, PolyMars, 12DAMDO, SpeedTutor, CRAFT GAMES, Samyam, Dani, CODYCANTEATTHIS, Friends, Family, Jesus and you!

Here's the video on how I made the game the video should be out on May 7th if you're viewing this early link: (2) I made Super Mario Maker.......but in UNITY! - YouTube

All copyrighted materials goes to Nintendo and their respective properties. This is a fan-made project, this is fair use. Thank you all for playing! :)
